description: This Java class defines a generic paginated response wrapper used for API responses, encapsulating pagination details and a list of items.

classes.name: PagedResponse
classes.description: A generic class representing a paginated API response with pagination metadata and items list.

methods.name: getTotalItems
methods.description: Returns the total number of items across all pages.

methods.name: getTotalPages
methods.description: Returns the total number of pages.

methods.name: getItems
methods.description: Returns the list of items for the current page.

methods.name: setTotalItems
methods.description: Sets the total number of items across all pages.

methods.name: setTotalPages
methods.description: Sets the total number of pages.

methods.name: setItems
methods.description: Sets the list of items for the current page.
